label: 関白
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: This official was in charge of the whole government, saw all correspondence and documents before they were presented to the Sovereign (Tennō) and supposedly assisted" the Sovereign to govern the empire. Actually he supplanted the Sovereign as ruler.  Only the leading member of the Northern Family (Hokke) of the Fujiwara was eligible for this post.  [天皇、北家、藤原]"
